description:
Rain and accumulated moisture vapour are no longer your concern. With underarm vents, a back zip, and gusseted cuffs, this 3-layer jacket lets you self-regulate the airflow to stay cool inside. While rain might not be the most enjoyable cycling companion, water-resistant zippers and a waterproof flap on the front zip keep it from getting too familiar while you ride.

  • Made of light and durable Artex fabric for waterproof-breathable protection
  • Soft micro-chamois collar with extended tail for extra coverage
  • Reflective strips all over the jacket give you 360-degree reflectivity
  • Waterproof two-way underarm zips (30cm.) provide ventilation
  • Large back vent (59cm) for regulated airflow
  • Gusseted cuffs
  • Water-resistant zippers on chest and hand pockets. Front zip has an inner storm flap and built-in rain gutter
  • Chest pocket with audio port
  • Extended tail keeps your back covered and warm
  • As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Transit Jacket CC - Men's
